verbose_text: For instance a cross-sectional study found lower plasma levels of vitamin B 12 in type 2 diabetic patients who were using metformin, while a retrospective review of medical records also showed this association [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] Short term metformin therapy has been found to decrease cobalamin in elderly patients [XREF_BIBR] On the other hand, vitamin B12 deficiency has also been reported in diabetic patients not taking metformin [XREF_BIBR].
